events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can process the refund?
Here is a photo of the wrong item and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the refund process starting promptly.
The refund case has been resolved with confirmation that the customer will receive their money back shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer has indicated satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
